abstract: H. Lamar McKay will run exploration, development and production operations worldwide, wrapping up a restructuring of the unit after the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico in 2010.
snippet: H. Lamar McKay will run exploration, development and production operations worldwide, wrapping up a restructuring of the unit after the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico in 2010.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — BP said on Friday that it had appointed H. Lamar McKay to run its exploration, development and production operations worldwide, wrapping up a restructuring of the unit after the disastrous oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico in 2010.

headline.main: BP Appoints New Chief of Production
headline.print_headline: BP Appoints New Chief Of Production
